forecastday.title: Tuesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy. High 11C. Winds NW at 15 to 30 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy. High 53F. Winds NW at 10 to 20 mph.

forecastday.title: Tuesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Partly cloudy early followed by cloudy skies overnight. Low near 5C. Winds N at 10 to 15 km/h.
forecastday.fcttext: Partly cloudy skies this evening will become overcast overnight. Low 41F. Winds N at 10 to 15 mph.

forecastday.title: Wednesday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Considerable cloudiness. Occasional rain showers in the afternoon. High 11C. Winds E at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 50%.
forecastday.fcttext: Cloudy early with showers for the afternoon hours. High 52F. Winds E at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 40%.

forecastday.title: Wednesday Night
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Periods of rain. Low 8C. Winds SE at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 12mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 48F. Winds SE at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 90%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Rain likely. High 14C. Winds S at 15 to 30 km/h. Chance of rain 100%. Rainfall near 25mm.
forecastday.fcttext: Periods of rain. High 58F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 80%. Rainfall may reach one inch.

forecastday.title: Thursday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain likely. Low 53F. Winds S at 10 to 20 mph. Chance of rain 70%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Friday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers early becoming a steady light rain later in the day. High 14C. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 70%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers early, becoming a steady rain later in the day. High 59F. Winds SSW at 5 to 10 mph. Chance of rain 70%.

forecastday.title: Friday Night

forecastday.fcttext: Rain showers in the evening will evolve into a more steady rain overnight. Low 51F. Winds SSW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%. Rainfall near a quarter of an inch.

forecastday.title: Saturday
forecastday.fcttext_metric: Showers in the morning with some clearing in the afternoon. High 13C. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 km/h. Chance of rain 60%.
forecastday.fcttext: Showers in the morning, then partly cloudy in the afternoon. High 56F. Winds WNW at 10 to 15 mph. Chance of rain 60%.

forecastday.fcttext: Mostly clear skies. Low 47F. Winds WNW at 5 to 10 mph.

forecastday.fcttext: Except for a few afternoon clouds, mainly sunny. High around 55F. Winds NW at 5 to 10 mph.
